DOC.brief_summary: The aim study accelerate development vaccine candidate diarrheal disease cause Shigella Enterotoxigenic Escherichia coli ( ETEC ) . We plan identify case laboratory-proven shigellosis ETEC-associated diarrhea , study humoral cellular immune parameter follow natural infection Shigella ETEC , compare level pre-existing local , humoral cellular immune parameter case shigellosis ETEC-associated diarrhea match control .
DOC.brief_title: Identification Correlates Protection Against Shigella Enterotoxigenic Escherichia Coli Infections
